markdownRemark.html: Click here to see the plan be re-created live by my web server running a PHP program. Here is what came off of my typewriter for Will this secret santa day at Puny:

prev.html: I should have built this 20 years ago. Slanty enclosure is from Gateway Electronics . Switching 5 & +/-12v power supply for now and plenty of space for switches/indicators and I-O recepticles. The voltmeter sitting on top is from ABC Electronics and will be installed with a 0-30v LM317 based variable power supply.
